verbose_text: Here, we pursued an unbiased approach to find new regulators of the intracellular partitioning of HLH-30 / TFEB and uncovered that the conserved gene Exportin-1 (xpo-1 / XPO1) potently increases the nuclear enrichment of HLH-30 / TFEB.
evidence: Exportin-1 (xpo-1/XPO1) potently increases the nuclear enrichment of HLH-30
